draft.subject: Additional Information Required - Chemco Corporation
draft.body:
Dear Daniel Schumann,

Thank you for submitting the insurance application for Chemco Corporation. We are currently reviewing your submission and require the following additional information to complete our underwriting evaluation:

1. Loss run for years 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020 are missing

Please provide the requested information at your earliest convenience so we can proceed with the quote process.

If you have any questions or need clarification on any of these items, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,

Underwriting Team
Commercial Insurance Division
Email: underwriting@company.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567
